item.title: Webscraping in Python - a Workflow
item.description: Scraping Stock Data “Without big data, you are blind and deaf in the middle of a freeway” – Geoffrey Moore The power of data science relies entirely on the quality and quantity of data we use for our models or analysis. Likewise, the internet has a wealth of untapped data available to us if we exercise a little creativity and patience to put together our own dataset. In this post, we will scrape Yahoo Finance to create a dataset of daily stock prices at top technology companies.
